items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
items.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.
items.title: AlphaIsYour/tokoeno: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.

items.content_html: Self-Assessment Quiz App is a lightweight web application that converts JSON data into interactive quizzes. With a simple interface built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, users can easily select different question sets and test their knowledge in real time.
items.title: DanyRolero/Quizify: Self-Assessment Quiz App is a lightweight web application that converts JSON data into interactive quizzes. With a simple interface built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, users can easily select different question sets and test their knowledge in real time.

items.content_html: DeployBuddy is a lightweight, full-stack tool that lets you securely trigger and monitor frontend deployments to S3 + CloudFront via GitHub Actions, with a clean UI and real-time status updates.
items.title: Kartikey-Narayan/deploy-buddy: DeployBuddy is a lightweight, full-stack tool that lets you securely trigger and monitor frontend deployments to S3 + CloudFront via GitHub Actions, with a clean UI and real-time status updates.

items.content_html: Formique is a lightweight, declarative JavaScript syntax library for generating WCAG accessibility and usability compliant forms.
items.title: Gugulethu-Nyoni/formique: Formique is a lightweight, declarative JavaScript syntax library for generating WCAG accessibility and usability compliant forms.

items.content_html: A modern & lightweight tool for creating and managing forms with support for various field types including text, text areas, date and file uploads.
items.title: simplyrk/form-builder: A modern & lightweight tool for creating and managing forms with support for various field types including text, text areas, date and file uploads.

items.content_html: The Notes App is a lightweight React-based web app showcasing secure authentication and note management (create, edit, delete, pin, search). With a cohesive purple-themed UI, smooth animations, and plain CSS, it offers a simple, reliable, and scalable prototype for note-taking solutions.
items.title: gontuvamsi/notes-app: The Notes App is a lightweight React-based web app showcasing secure authentication and note management (create, edit, delete, pin, search). With a cohesive purple-themed UI, smooth animations, and plain CSS, it offers a simple, reliable, and scalable prototype for note-taking solutions.

items.content_html: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: ClassTrack is a lightweight scheduling tool that helps students and administrators manage class schedules without conflicts. Easily add new classes, detect time overlaps, and keep your timetable organized and clash-free.
items.title: adk-saugat/ClassTrack: ClassTrack is a lightweight scheduling tool that helps students and administrators manage class schedules without conflicts. Easily add new classes, detect time overlaps, and keep your timetable organized and clash-free.
